name: Paul Johnston - trying to be civil (as a service)

content.html: So... what is the *best* way to only pull in the exact and only the needed dependencies on a java AWS Lambda function and *no more*? Working on the basis of trying to minimise the AWS Lambda function to its absolute minimum size...
content.value:
So... what is the *best* way to only pull in the exact and only the needed dependencies on a java AWS Lambda function and *no more*?

Working on the basis of trying to minimise the AWS Lambda function to its absolute minimum size...
